label: Fridge Freezers
description: Appliances that combine a refrigerator and a freezer in one unit.

subcategories.label: American Style Fridge Freezers
subcategories.description: Large fridge freezers with side-by-side doors and a water dispenser.

subcategories.label: Integrated Fridge Freezers
subcategories.description: Fridge freezers that are built into kitchen cabinets.

subcategories.label: Under Counter Fridge Freezers
subcategories.description: Compact fridge freezers that fit under a kitchen counter.

subcategories.label: Larder Freezers
subcategories.description: Freezers that only have shelves and no drawers.

subcategories.label: Chest Freezers
subcategories.description: Freezers that have a lid that opens from the top.
